title: Copy to Compsites Macro
content:
Is there a macro I can use to copy metrics to compsites that use that glyph. I know I can use the blue arrow below the glyph in the glyph window, but it would be a real time saver to do it all in one go.

Rr.

 [‹ Testing in Word](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911201007/http:/typophile.com/node/31398 "Go to previous forum topic") [DTL CompareMaster ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911201007/http:/typophile.com/node/33270 "Go to next forum topic")
author: RachelR
